product_name: Energizer 15 Minute Car and Home Battery Charger
long_description: Dead batteries got you down? With the Energizer 15 Minute charger you'll be back in business in no time at all! Included car adapter makes charger ideal for road trips and car-camping adventures; charger also plugs into standard electrical outlets. Fully charges 2 AA or AAA batteries in just 15 min.; charges 4 batteries in 30 min. Charge status indicator alerts you when batteries are fully charged. Built-in safety timer and temperature sensor ensure proper operation. Includes 4 AA batteries; charge batteries before using.
short_description: Dead batteries got you down? With the Energizer 15 Minute charger you'll be back in business in no time at all!
